title: Video Premiere: Glass Animals – Black Mambo
body:
Having wowed with the impressive [_**Leaflings**_](http://itunes.apple.com/gb/album/leaflings-ep/id528928007) EP last year, Oxfordshire quartet [**Glass Animals**](http://glass-animals.tumblr.com/) kicked it up a gear with _Black Mambo_, attracting a phenomenal interest on [Soundcloud](https://soundcloud.com/glassanimals) and Hype Machine. Merging billowing hip-hop inspired beats with a murky, mysterious pop sensibility, it’s seductive, enthralling and undoubtedly one of the singles of 2013 thus far. Set for release on Paul Epworth’s very own Wolf Tone label, we’re delighted to present the UK premiere of the stunning visuals to accompany Black Mambo. Verging upon psychotic, it’s a disturbingly brilliant video, and yet another sign of an immensely talented, and adventurous group.

Check out the Harry Reavley directed video below, and a host of EU shows after the jump.

JUNE  
Wed 5 – Berghain, Berlin  
Wed 19 – Electrowerkz, London  
Thu 20 – Louisiana, Bristol  
Fri 21 – Trof Fallowfield, Manchester

JULY  
Thu 18 – Melt! Festival, Ferropolis

AUGUST  
Fri 2 – Off Festival, Poland
